thread.section_title: Bake Me A Wish! Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bake Me A Wish! | www.bakemeawish.com | 7 of 186
thread.title: CHL
thread.title_full: Bake Me A Wish! reviewed by CHL

author: CHL
title: CHL
text: I ordered three cakes and four sets of cupcakes to different spots across the country and paid for each to be delivered overnight before noon. The cupcakes were raved about by all recipients. The vanilla bean cake was moist and delicious and a big hit! The Boston Creme pie was lovely and the packaging superb. The black/white cake was disappointing in that it was a bit stale tasting. I will not order that one again. Also, of the six packages - only four were delivered by noon as promised. So, I don't really think it pays to order overnight delivery. I think one should plan ahead when ordering here. I will definitely order again as overall it was above average, gourmet quality.
